Name: dancing chair
About the game: Two men struggle to get the chair!!! 【RULE】 After stopping the music, If you can sit the chair at a certain time , YOU WIN ! 【SETTING】 ・You can choose the time to sit. 【OPERATION】 Walkㅤㅤ:ㅤWㅤㅤAttack1ㅤ:ㅤE Turn（L）:ㅤAㅤㅤAttack2ㅤ:ㅤR Turn（R）:ㅤDㅤㅤAttack3ㅤ:ㅤT Sitㅤㅤㅤㅤ:ㅤSㅤㅤJumpㅤㅤ:ㅤSpace Restartㅤ:ㅤEnter ※You can see them in [Show Config] in the game.
